generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with white lane markings, typical of a road where vehicles and pedestrians cross.
- sidewalk: The curb and the paved area adjacent to it, where people are standing and walking, indicate a sidewalk.
- building: The large dark structure on the right with the "SATURN" sign is clearly a building.
- vegetation: There are trees visible in the background and on the right side of the image.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows the open sky with some clouds.
- person: Multiple individuals are visible walking or standing on the sidewalk and crossing the road.
- bicycle: A bicycle with a rider is prominently featured in the center-left of the image.
- car: The Mercedes-Benz emblem visible in the foreground indicates the presence of a car.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are mounted on poles above the road, visible in the upper part of the image.
- pole: Several vertical poles, including traffic light poles and streetlight poles, are visible throughout the image.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign is visible on the left side of the image, mounted on a pole.
